states.start:
👋 Hi, welcome to anonymous chat bot in English

👇 Press buttons bellow to get started!

menu.general:
📕 You're in the main menu now

👉 To start chatting, press the button bellow
menu.chat_found:
👑 We're found company for you!

/newchat — to start new chat
/stopchat — to stop this chat
menu.chat_ended:
Your chat is ended hope you enjoyed this session

Write @uw935 if you saw some strange things
menu.loading_wait: 🔍 We stil searching new company for you, please wait...
menu.chat_type_error:
🚷 You can't send this type of message

Message wasn't delivered.
menu.wait_too_long: It's getting too long to find company for you..
